column1: Smoque BBQ////Went for lunch on our Company Outing. I had the Half Pulled Pork Sandwich w/ slaw and fries
column2: and it was AWESOME! The sandwich was huge (i'm afraid to see what a whole one looks like)
column4: and for someone who dosen't even eat coleslaw
column5: that container was empty. The best part? BYOB
column6: so I was able to enjoy my Hard Apple Cider with my sandwich.
